channel.title: Prs on Van der Laan & Science
channel.description: Recent content in Prs on Van der Laan & Science

item.title: Ewan Birney – On Genetics as a whole, and PRSs, and Robert Plomin’s book
item.description: Background Twitter. I have a love-hate affair with it, but when it comes to science I #loveit. It is great to keep track of some influencers, like Mark McCarthy, Cecile Janssens, Eric Topol, Cecilia Lindgren, or Sek Kathiresan. I learn a lot from their work, their views on new science, etc. Likewise, I follow Ewan Birney, director at EMBL-EBI. He has a – excellent – habit to take a subject and produce a nice summarising thread.
